sentences.en: "You're standing in the way," she said. "Would you mind moving aside"
sentences.cn: .。。“你挡着道了，”她说，“麻烦你让一下。”

sentences.en: £130 million would be set aside for repairs to schools.
sentences.cn: 将划拨1.3亿英镑用于学校的修缮。

sentences.en: Billy Ewing grabbed him by the elbow and took him aside.
sentences.cn: 比利·尤因拉着他的胳膊肘把他带到了一边。

sentences.en: By pushing aside unpleasant thoughts they merely repress these thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他们对不愉快的想法不予理会，其结果仅仅是压制了这些想法。

sentences.en: Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.
sentences.cn: 将橙皮擦出大约一茶匙的细末待用。

sentences.en: He finished the tea and laid the cup aside.
sentences.cn: 他喝完茶后把杯子搁在一边。

sentences.en: He pushed his half-eaten salad aside and left.
sentences.cn: 他推开吃了一半的色拉走了。

sentences.en: He stepped aside to let Katherine go in first.
sentences.cn: 他站到一边让凯瑟琳先进去。

sentences.en: He stood aside and motioned Don to the door.
sentences.cn: 他站到一边并示意唐到门口去。

sentences.en: I pushed the problem aside; at present it was insoluble.
sentences.cn: 我把问题抛在一边，目前它还无法解决。

sentences.en: I threw aside my mosquito net and jumped out of bed.
sentences.cn: 我把蚊帐甩到一边，跳下床来。

sentences.en: Mark drew me aside and explained the problem.
sentences.cn: 马克把我拉到一边给我解释这个问题。

sentences.en: Non-state firms gradually elbow aside the inefficient state-owned ones.
sentences.cn: 非国有企业逐渐挤掉了效率低下的国有企业。

sentences.en: She swept her thick hair aside.
sentences.cn: 她把浓密的头发梳到一边。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister swept aside concern about the rising cost of mortgages.
sentences.cn: 首相对按揭费用上涨的忧虑置之不理。

sentences.en: These cavils aside, most of the essays are very good indeed.
sentences.cn: 这些吹毛求疵的批评暂且不论，多数论文的确是很不错的。

sentences.en: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward.
sentences.cn: 他们还声称保安人员将一位乘务员推搡至一边。

sentences.en: This allowed Ms. Kelley to lay aside money to start her business.
sentences.cn: 这样凯利女士就可以把钱存起来创业。

sentences.en: Will put his arm around her shoulders and drew her aside.
sentences.cn: 威尔一只胳膊搂着她的肩膀，把她拉到了一边。

words.tran_cn: 旁白；私语，悄悄话；离题的话

phrases.tran_cn: 把…从人群中叫出来以私下谈话

trans.tran_cn: 到旁边，留出，不顾，撇开，除…外
trans.tran_en: moved to one side or away from you
words spoken by an actor to the people watching a play, that the other characters in the play do not hear
